principles.pattern_name: Convert correlated EXISTS to hash anti-join
principles.description: When a correlated EXISTS subquery uses NOT IN semantics, converting to explicit NOT IN with hash anti-join eliminates row-by-row evaluation
applicable_when: EXISTS subquery with NOT IN predicate

gold_nominations.principle_demonstrated: Convert correlated EXISTS to hash anti-join
gold_nominations.why_exemplary: Clean 2.3x speedup with clear before/after plan difference
